biocontainers.name: nanopolishcomp
biocontainers.summary: NanopolishComp is a Python3 package for downstream analyses of Nanopolish output files

biotools.summary:
NanopolishComp is a Python3 package for downstream analyses of Nanopolish output files.
It is a companion package for Nanopolish.

galaxy.summary: NanopolishComp contains 2 modules. Eventalign_collapse collapses the raw file generated by nanopolish eventalign by kmers rather than by event. Freq_meth_calculate methylation frequency at genomic CpG sites from the output of nanopolish call-methylation.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: NanopolishComp is a Python3 package for downstream analyses of Nanopolish output files.It is a companion package for Nanopolish.
